t: Amazon Launches First Electric Cargo Bike Deliveries to Customers in Norwich - UK Press Centre
s: August 14, 2024 - A new fleet of electric cargo bikes will deliver thousands of packages per week as Amazon opens micromobility hub at its delivery station in Norfolk. The electric cargo bikes are part of a £300 million investment to help electrify and decarbonise Amazon’s UK transportation network
